title: Ask an Australian about guns and gun laws [Turkish version]
creator_credit: Kay Roberts and Artransa Park Studios
brief_description: Illustrates the effects of careless handling of firearms and explains the Australian laws regarding the use of firearms. Note: In Turkish.
